title: Bloomberg Markets: Renaissance’s Medallion Makes Stunning Shift
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Renaissance’s Medallion Makes Stunning Shift
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Miles Weiss SEC Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing his story on how the secretive quant firm changed course by hiking investment caps.
